name: Relic Romance (Beta)
description:
Relic Romance is a competitive two-player hotseat game in which two friends (or enemies) go head to head to see who can be the first to cash three relics.

Each match takes place in a massive enclosed arena. Players must compete with one another, killing enemies, gaining levels and buying upgrades in order to become strong enough to reach the relic and bring it back.

Relic Romance is a two-player only game. The game is designed for parties and for competitively uncompetitive play. Have fun with it, but remember that it is still in beta and that there will be updates to iron out bugs, improve the balance and add new features.

Be sure to read the README before running the game. It has important information that will help you set the game up to run smoothly!

Original Beta Release Date: November 9, 2013

Post-mortem Commentary:

Relic Romance was our first attempt at a multiplayer game. Though it is in a playable state, please note that development on this game has been halted indefinitely; not all the characters and features we planned are in there, but there should still be plenty to play with.
